item.title: The FOMO-fueled gold bubble may now be turning into a ‘mini-bust,’ analysts say
item.description: "The latest leg of the gold rally looks like a market bubble that is in its final stages."

item.title: Candy inflation has spooked so many consumers almost 80% say they’re forced to scale back how much to buy for Halloween
item.description: Of the 6,000+ shoppers surveyed, 83% said they’re capping their candy spending at $100.

item.title: AIG to acquire the majority of renewal rights to Everest Group’s global retail insurance portfolio in $2 billion deal
item.description: The acquisition gives AIG access to future business without inheriting responsibility for claims and obligations predating the deal.

item.title: Open-source AI is ‘China’s game right now’—and that’s a problem for the U.S. and its allies, Andreessen Horowitz partner says
item.description: Andreessen Horowitz partner Anjney Midha says China is leading in open-source AI, driven by startups like DeepSeek, while the U.S. is playing catch-up...

item.title: Saudi investment chief warns: Global business needs cooperation, not protectionism
item.description: “In my view, no nation or company can achieve resilience [in] isolation,” said H.E. Khalid A. Al-Falih.
